char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She doesn't look the same the last time I fought her...

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: While my appearance is the same, the only thing you aren't seeing is my hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Correct. My magic must've worked on you.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Every day, people shed 50-100 strands. You didn't expect to see me shed all of them!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm still affected, but you aren't because you started it. How come it's not growing back?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This is an incredibly moving story.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I have no time for a long speech, but this may call for an even bigger battle!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'd be ready for something like that.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You'll be ready to be put to shame.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hair loss is called alopecia. It's an autoimmune disease that literally destroys it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My hair was my trademark and a way for people to identify me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm now embarrassed, vulnerable, shaken, and betrayed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I imagine all the children who come up and talk to me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hair matters. People should be equally judged on whatever hairstyle they have.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But I still have my strength. This change is a huge psychological shock.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Anyway, are you finally ready to turn off this spell?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You can try as you might, but only winners may be able to...
